info.description: The Representational State Transfer Application Programming Interface (RESTful API) for Mainframe Application Tuner.
info.title: MAT REST API DOCUMENTATION

get.description: Use this call to get the CallerID details for the specific measurement USING PROFILE OR MONITOR

parameters.name: csect
parameters.description: The name of the CSECT that you request the CallerID details for. You get the "csect" value from the CodeView CSECT Mode call response. The CSECT name can be empty

parameters.name: module
parameters.description: The name of the module that you request the CallerID details for. You get the "module" value from the CodeView CSECT Mode or from the CodeView Module Mode call response. The module name can be empty

401.description: You are not authorized to view the resource

403.description: Access to the requested resource is forbidden

404.description: The requested resource is not found

get.description: Use this call to get the Histogram analysis data for the specific measurement. If the source program listing is not registered with MAT, this call returns the CSECT activity locations on the offsets level, with the group size value of 4 bytes. If the source program listing is registered with MAT, this call returns the CSECT activity locations on the statement level and specifies the verb associated with the statement number. If you register a listing using Endevor® footprints,you can also retrieve the specific Endevor® listing details. The example in the responses section below shows the model with offsets. For a complete description of all response models, refer to the REST API Histogram article in the documentation.

parameters.name: csect
parameters.description: The name of the CSECT that you request the Histogram data for. You get the "csect" value from the CodeView CSECT Mode call response. The CSECT name can be empty

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Specifies the histogram group size parameter that defines the resolution of the histogram. If you do not specify the group parameter, the group size defaults to 4 bytes. If program listing is registered with MAT, the group parameter is ignored.Values: numbers between 2 and 999999

parameters.name: listing
parameters.description: Enables the listing retrieval option through Endevor® footprints

parameters.name: module
parameters.description: The name of the module that you request the Histogram data for. You get the "module" value from the CodeView CSECT Mode call response. The module name can be empty

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The maximum number of the top consuming CSECT activity locations that you want to obtain in the response. If you specify 0, you get the list of all CSECT activity locations that MAT has detected during the measurement. Values: numbers between 0 and 300

401.description: You are not authorized to view the resource

403.description: Access to the requested resource is forbidden

404.description: The requested resource is not found

If the source program listing is registered with MAT, this call returns the CSECT activity locations on the statement level and specifies the verb associated with the statement number. If you register a listing using Endevor® footprints,you can also retrieve the specific Endevor® listing details. The example in the responses section below shows the model with offsets. get.description: Use this call to get the details of a selected DB2 SQL statement for the specific measurement

parameters.name: dbrm
parameters.description: The name of the package (DBRM) that the requested DB2 statement belongs to. You get the "dbrm" value from the DB2View call response

parameters.name: stmtnum
parameters.description: The number of the unique SQL statement that you request the details for. You get the "stmt_num" value from the DB2View call response

parameters.name: totalsamps
parameters.description: The total number of samples taken for the requested statement. You get the "total_samps" value from the DB2View call response

post.description: You can use this API call to create and invoke monitor profiles. Use the "create" or "invoke" values for the "action" parameter in the request body to trigger the respective action. With the "invoke" action, you can use the optional "listing" URL parameter that enables the automated listing retrieval and registration through Endevor® footprints. For a complete description of all request models and parameters, refer to the REST API Manage Monitor Profiles section in the documentation.

parameters.name: listing
parameters.description: Enables the automated listing registration through Endevor footprints

parameters.name: profile
parameters.description: The profile name that you want to create or invoke. The profile name can contain 1 to 8 characters, a combination of alphanumeric and national characters (A-Z, 0-9, and @), the first character must be an alphabetic or @. The profile name must not contain characters # and $.

401.description: You are not authorized to view the resource

403.description: Access to the requested resource is forbidden

404.description: The requested resource is not found

csect.description: The CSECT name of the calling program

csectdescription.example: COBOL test program distributed with MAT

module.description: The module name that contains the CSECT of the calling program

offset.description: Hexadecimal offset from the start of the CSECT of the calling program

pct.description: Percentage of the monitored period when the program was calling the CSECT

active.description: Percentage of the monitored period when the CSECT was using CPU

c.description: Availability of the CallerID information (Y or blank)

l.description: Location of the module in virtual memory (A, B, G, or blank)

overLap.description: Percentage of the monitored period when both the CPU was active and file access was occurring

total.description: The total of Active and Wait times for the CSECT

wait.description: Percentage of the monitored period when the CSECT was not using CPU

x.description: Availability of the Extended CallerID information (Y or blank)

CodeView.title: CodeView
CodeView.description: The CodeView measurement details in Csect Mode.

active.description: Percentage of the monitored period when CPU usage was detected for this statement

averageresptime.description: The the average response time (in seconds) for the SQL statement to be completed

callcount.description: The number of times during the monitoring session that MAT detected this SQL statement being called from the target address space

cpupcall.description: The amount of CPU time (in seconds) needed by DB2 to process each DB2 call for this SQL statement

datafrom.description: The method used to collect the SQL data: H (DB2 Harvester), S (DB2 sampling), or B (both)

dbrm.description: The name of a package (DBRM) that describes the SQL statement

declarestmt.description: The statement number of the DECLARE that is associated with the statement, or NA if no DECLARE is associated with the statement

ds.description: The type of SQL being executed: D (Dynamic) or S (Static)

length.description: The length of the SQL statement

stmtnum.description: The number of the unique SQL statement

total.description: The total of Active and Wait times for this statement

totalcpu.description: The total amount of CPU time (in seconds) needed by DB2 to process all DB2 calls for this SQL statement

totalresptime.description: The total time (in seconds) for the SQL statement to be completed

totalsamps.description: The total number of taken samples

type.description: The type of operation that is being performed with the statement

wait.description: Percentage of the monitored period when the program was in a wait state for this statement

dbrm.description: The name of the package (DBRM) that the SQL statement belongs to

sqltext.example: SELECT ENTRY, CUSTOMER, DOW, CUPS, TYPE, UPDIND FROM CUPOFJOE4DATA FORUPDATE

stmtnum.description: The number of the requested SQL statement

type.description: The type of operation that is being performed with the statement

c.description: Availability of the CallerID information (Y or blank)

d.description: Availability of additional details about the module (Y or blank)

offset.description: Hexadecimal offset within the Csect, or the module (if Csect name is not known)

pct.description: Percentage of the monitored period that a delay for this offset is detected

stmt.description: Number of the high-level language statement (returns only if the program listing was registered)

x.description: Availability of the Extended CallerID information (Y or blank)

DelayLocation.title: DelayLocation
DelayLocation.description: The DelayView Locations details for the measurement.

active.description: Percentage of the monitored period when CPU usage was detected for this delay category

majorCategory.description: The name of the major delay category

minorCategory.description: The name of the minor delay category

total.description: The total of Active and Wait times for this delay category

active.description: Percentage of the monitored period when the CSECT was using CPU

offset.description: Hexadecimal offset of the CSECT activity

total.description: The total of Active and Wait times for the CSECT

wait.description: Percentage of the monitored period when the CSECT was not using CPU

active.description: Displays the percentage of the monitored period that the processing of an IMS statement used CPU

call.description: Displays the type of call the application issued with the associated IMS statement

dbdname.description: Displays the name of the IMS database

popts.description: Displays the processing options generated in the PCB during the PSBGEN

psbname.description: Displays the name of the PSB generated to support this application

psbno.description: Displays the relative offset of this PCB from the start of the PSB

segment.description: Displays the name of a segment within the IMS database

total.description: The sum of both the Actv% and the Wait% columns

wait.description: Displays the percentage of the monitored period that the program waited for IMS data to be returned

averageCPU.description: The total of Active and Wait times for the CSECT

cpuTime.description: Percentage of the monitored period when the CSECT was using CPU

averageElapsed.description: The average elapsed time (in seconds) for all transactions detected.

regionActive.description: The time that the IMS Region was active during the monitor session.

regionActivePct.description: The percentage of time that the IMS Region was active during the monitor session.

regionIdle.description: The time that the IMS Region was idle (not actively processing transactions) during the monitor session.

regionIdlePct.description: The percentage of time that the IMS Region was idle (not actively processing transactions) during the monitor session.

regionTotal.description: The total time that the IMS Region was operating during the monitor session.

regionTotalPct.description: The percentage of total time that the IMS Region was operating during the monitor session.

field.description: The name of the field within the segment.

segment.description: The name of the IMS data base segment that is searched.

ssa.description: The relative segment search argument in the search list.

active.description: Percentage of the monitored period when the module was using CPU

group.description: Pseudo group name defined for the module

overLap.description: Percentage of the monitored period when both the CPU was active and file access was occurring

total.description: The total of Active and Wait times for the module

wait.description: Percentage of the monitored period when module was not using CPU

ModuleView.title: ModuleView
ModuleView.description: The CodeView measurement details in Module Mode.

monnum.description: The unique monitor number of the measurment

MonitorHistory.title: MonitorHistory
MonitorHistory.description: The details of available measurements that are stored in the history of the specific monitor profile.

mds.description: The name of the original monitor data set (MDS) with the measurment

monnum.description: The unique monitor number of the measurment

profileName.description: The profile name that the measurement belongs to

MonitorList.title: MonitorList
MonitorList.description: The details of available measurements that are currently stored in the MAT database.

ProfileList.title: ProfileList
ProfileList.description: The list of all available monitor profiles that are stored in MAT Global Information File.

ResponseProfiles.title: ResponseProfiles
ResponseProfiles.description: The list of all available monitor profiles that are stored in MAT Global Information File.

count.description: Count of the monitored period when the program was calling the CSECT

csect.description: The CSECT name of the calling program

csectdescription.example: COBOL test program distributed with CA MAT

module.description: The module name that contains the CSECT of the calling program

offset.description: Hexadecimal offset from the start of the CSECT of the calling program

pct.description: Percentage of the monitored period when the program was calling the CSECT

active.description: The percentage of time when the CPU was actively processing the transaction

averageSUs.description: the average number of CPU service units that were required to process the transaction

avgCPU.description: The average CPU time that was required for the transaction

data.description: The percentage of time when the transaction was delayed because of an I/O request

other.description: The percentage of time when delays other than CPU or data-related were detected

total.description: The summation of all delay categories

totalCPU.description: The cumulative CPU time for the transaction (in seconds)

totalSUs.description: The total amount of CPU time in service units that were used by the transaction

Tranview.title: Tranview
Tranview.description: The TranView details for the measurement.

active.description: The percentage of samples used that were recorded when the application was actively using CPU

asid.description: The address space identifier of the job that was monitored

ciclvl.description: The release level of the CICS system that was used by the job

cpumodel.description: The CPU model number of the system where the monitor was executed

cpurtadj.description: The processor-specific adjustment rate used in the calculation of CPU service units

cpuserie.description: The serial number of the processor where the monitor was executed

cpusvcunits.description: The CPU Service units, which are an interval of CPU time normalized by a CPU processor-specific adjustment rate

cputime.description: The CPU time value for the measurement

cpuver.description: The CPU version of the system where the monitor was executed

db2lvl.description: The release level of the DB2 system that was used by the job

dcmlvl.description: The release level of the Datacom system that was used by the job

duration.description: The period of time, during which the address space was measured for this monitor (HH:MM:SS)

dynalink.description: User-specified dynamic linklist (if using differ from a linklist specified during IPL)

ecputime.description: The ECPU time value for the measurement

excpcnt.description: The number of EXCPs or I/Os issued by the address space during the duration of the measurement

excprate.description: The number of EXCPs or I/Os per second being issued by the address space during the duration of the measurement

ezaptime.description: The Elig zAAP time value for the measurement

eziptime.description: The Elig zIIP time value for the measurement

finlrate.description: The final rate, at which MAT observed the activity of the address space

gl4lvl.description: The release level of the Natural system that was used by the job

idmslvl.description: The release level of the IDMS system that was used by the job

imslvl.description: The release level of the IMS system that was used by the job

jobid.description: JES job identifier of the job that was monitored

jobname.description: The name of the job that was monitored

lpardisdelay.description: The time when the address space was observed to be delayed because of either LPAR delay or other disabled work on the processor during the measurement

mdsn.description: The monitor data set name where the measurement is stored

monnum.description: The unique monitor number of the measurement

mqlvl.description: The release level of the MQ Series (MQS) system that was used by the job

mvslvl.description: The release level of the MVS system where the target job executed

nondisp.description: The time when the address space was observed to be nondispatchable during the measurement

obsvused.description: The actual number of observations made for the monitor

osfmid.description: The function modification identifier of the operating system where the target job executed

osname.description: The name and level of the operating system

osowner.description: The name of the operating system owner

pageins.description: The number of page-in operations for the job

pagerate.description: The number of page-in operations per second

percentwait.description: The percentage of samples used that were recorded when the application was not using CPU and was waiting on a resource

profile.description: The profile name that the measurement belongs to

program.description: The name of the program that was monitored

requestd.description: The number of requested observations in the monitor profile as requested by the user

rgnlimh.description: The amount of private storage (region) available above 16 MB

rgnliml.description: The amount of private storage (region) available below 16 MB

rgnusedh.description: The high-water-mark value for the used region size above the 16-MB line

rgnusedl.description: The high-water-mark value for the used region size below the 16-MB line

saplvl.description: The release level of the SAP system that was used by the job

srbtime.description: The SRB time value for the measurement

swappedout.description: The time when the address space was observed to be swapped out during the measurement

sysname.description: An eight-character system name identifier for the z/OS image where the monitor was executed

tcbact.description: The average number of TCBs that were actively using the CPU during an observation

tcbtime.description: The TCB time value for the measurement

totsampl.description: The number of samples used from the measurement

userid.description: Identifier of the user who requested the monitor

usslvl.description: The release level of the UNIX System Services (USS) system that was used by the job

wait.description: The elapsed time that the monitor spent waiting

zaptime.description: The zAAP time value for the measurement

ziptime.description: The zIIP time value for the measurement

Tunmeta.title: Tunmeta
Tunmeta.description: The OverView details for the measurement.
